Iwan Budianto Jawab Dua Isu Panas Soal KLB PSSI
01 Nov 2019, 22:12 by Tempo.co, Nurdin Saleh
TEMPO.CO, Jakarta - Kongres Luar Biasa (KLB) PSSI 2019 akan digelar di Hotel Shangrila, Jakarta, Sabtu ini, 2 November 2019. KLB PSSI ini akan memilih Ketua Umum, Wakil Ketua Umum, dan anggota Komite Eksekutif (Exco) periode 2019-2023.
Plt Ketua Umum PSSI, Iwan Budianto, berharap tak ada lagi polemik soal keabsahan kongres. "Kami harap jangan ada lagi yang berpolemik terkait KLB itu 2 November atau 25 Januari harus ada izin atau tidak dari FIFA. Karena perwakilan FIFA dan AFC sudah hadir," kata dia.
Sebelumnya, keabsahan KLB ini sempat terus disorot salah satu calon ketua umum PSSI, La Nyalla Mattalitti. Ia mempertanyakan legalitas kongres yang menurutnya harusnya digelar Januari 2020 setelah kompetisi usai. "Saya sudah sampaikan, selama kongres digelar 2 November maka saya menarik diri," kata La Nyalla, Jumat, 1 November 2019.
Menurut dia, penyelenggaraan kongres pada tanggal tersebut dianggap tidak betul sehingga tak akan datang. "Kalau saya teruskan maka saya bisa ditertawai orang, apalagi saya mantan ketua umum. Jadi tidak mungkin (hadir)," ucap pria yang juga Ketua DPD RI ini.
La Nyalla mengatakan akan datang ke kongres PSSI bila digelar pada Januari 2020. "Aturannya Januari itu. Dan saya baru mau mencalonkan. Tapi rupanya tetap berjalan 2 November, jadi mari dilihat saja besok hasilnya," kata dia seperti dikutip laman PSSI.
Bagi Iwan Budianto, kehadiran delegasi badan sepak bola dunia dan Asia, FIFA dan AFC, menjadi bukti keabsahan KLB nanti. Para delegasi itu sudah hadir di Jakarta sejak Jumat. Dua delegasi FIFA yang akan hadir, yakni Head of Member Association Governance Service, Luca Nicola dan Development Manager Southeast and East Asia, Lavin Vignesh.
Sedangkan utusan AFC ada tiga, yakni Head of South Asia Unit AFC Member Association and Regional Associations Departemen, Purushottam Kattel; Manager of Asean Unit AFC Member Association and Regional Associations Departement, Nhodkeo Phawadee; dan Secretary of AFC Member Association and Regional Associations Departement, Varankumar Sagaran.
Sementara itu terkait kritik 9 calon ketua soal tak adanya sosialisasi tata cara pemilihan Komite Eksekutif PSSI dan pembatalan debat kandidat, Iwan Budianto menyatakan hal itu tak melanggar aturan. Dalam electoral code dan best practice FIFA tidak mengatur dan mewajibkan sosialisasi tata cara pemilihan. Adapun Pembatalan acara debat calon Komite Eksekutif PSSI disebutnya menjadi wewenang dari Komite Pemilihan.
Bagi Iwan, persiapan kongres sudah maksimal dilakukan. "Untuk undangan KLB ini kami sudah mengirimkan ke voter sejak satu bulan sebelum Kongres. Sekali lagi kami mengucapkan selamat berkongres kepada seluruh calon Komite Eksekutif PSSI periode 2019-2023," tukas Iwan.
Kongres ini akan diikuti 86 voter dari anggota PSSI, yakni 34 Asosiasi Provinsi (Asprov), 18 klub Liga 1, 16 klub Liga 2, 16 klub Liga 3, 1 Asosiasi Futsal (FFI), dan 1 Asosiasi Sepak Bola Wanita.
KLB PSSI kali ini akan memilih 15 personel Exco PSSI 2019-2023, yaitu ketua umum, dua wakil ketua umum, dan 12 anggota exco. Adapun 11 calon ketua PSSI yang akan bersaing adalah Arif Putra Wicaksono, Aven Hinelo, Benhard Limbong, Benny Erwin, Fary Djemi Francis. Lalu ada La Nyalla Mattalitti, Mochamad Iriawan, Rahim Soekasah, Sarman El Hakim, Vijaya Fitriyasa, dan Yesayas Oktavianus.
text:
Iwan Budianto Answered Two Hot Issues on PSB KLB
01 Nov 2019, 22:12 by Tempo.co, Nurdin Saleh
TEMPO.CO, Jakarta - PSSI 2019 Extraordinary Congress (KLB) will be held at the Shangrila Hotel, Jakarta, this Saturday, November 2, 2019. The PSSI KLB will elect the Chairperson, Deputy Chairperson, and Executive Committee members (Exco) for the 2019 period. -2023.
Acting Chairperson of PSSI, Iwan Budianto, hopes that there will be no more polemics over the validity of the congress. "We hope that there will be no more polemic related to the KLB on November 2 or January 25, there must be permission or not from FIFA. Because FIFA and AFC representatives are already present," he said.
Previously, the validity of this KLB was continuously highlighted by one of the PSSI general chairperson candidates, La Nyalla Mattalitti. He questioned the legality of the congress which according to him should have been held in January 2020 after the competition was over. "I have already said, during the 2 November congress that was held I withdrew," La Nyalla said, Friday, November 1, 2019.
According to him, the holding of the congress on that date was considered incorrect so that it would not come. "If I continue then I can be laughed at by people, moreover I am a former chairman. So it is not possible (to be present)," said the man who is also the Chairman of the DPD RI.
La Nyalla said that he would come to the PSSI congress if it was held in January 2020. "The rules are in January. And I just want to nominate. But apparently it still runs November 2, so let's just look at the results tomorrow," he said as quoted by the PSSI website.
For Iwan Budianto, the presence of the delegation of world soccer bodies and Asia, FIFA and AFC, is proof of the validity of the KLB later. The delegates have been present in Jakarta since Friday. Two FIFA delegations will be present, namely the Head of Members of the Governance Service Association, Luca Nicola and Southeast and East Asia Development Manager Lavin Vignesh.
Whereas there are three AFC delegates, namely the Head of South Asia Unit of the AFC Member Association and Regional Associations Department, Purushottam Kattel; Manager of Asean Unit AFC Member Association and Regional Associations Department, Nhodkeo Phawadee; and Secretary of the AFC Member Association and Regional Associations Department, Varankumar Sagaran.
Meanwhile, related to the criticism of the 9 candidates for the chairman regarding the lack of socialization on the procedures for the election of the PSSI Executive Committee and the cancellation of the candidate debate, Iwan Budianto stated that it did not violate the rules. In the electoral code and best practice FIFA does not regulate and require the socialization of election procedures. The cancellation of the debates on the candidates for the PSSI Executive Committee are said to be the authority of the Election Committee.
For Iwan, congress preparations were maximally carried out. "For this KLB invitation, we have sent it to the voters since one month before the Congress. Once again, we congratulate all candidates for the PSSI Executive Committee for the 2019-2023 period," said Iwan.
The congress will be attended by 86 voters from PSSI members, namely 34 Provincial Associations (Asprov), 18 League 1 clubs, 16 League 2 clubs, 16 League 3 clubs, 1 Futsal Association (FFI), and 1 Women's Football Association.
This PSSI KLB will elect 15 Exco PSSI 2019-2023 personnel, namely the general chairman, two deputy chairmen, and 12 exco members. The 11 PSSI chair candidates who will compete are Arif Putra Wicaksono, Aven Hinelo, Benhard Limbong, Benny Erwin, Fary Djemi Francis. Then there are La Nyalla Mattalitti, Mochamad Iriawan, Rahim Soekasah, Sarman El Hakim, Vijaya Fitriyasa, and Yesayas Oktavianus.
